per_frame_1=myVolume = (bass+treb+mid)/3;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*sin(7*bass)*3.78*time;
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*sin(7*treb)*6.56*time;
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*sin(7*mid)*4.35*time;
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.1*sin(0.89*time);
per_frame_6=wave_y = wave_y + 0.1*sin(0.76*time);
per_frame_7=wave_mystery = wave_mystery + min(0.1*sin(time)*myVolume, 0.2);
per_frame_8=ob_r = ob_r + 1.5*sin(7*bass)*3.78*time;
per_frame_9=ob_b = ob_b + 1.5*sin(7*treb)*6.56*time;
per_frame_10=ob_g = ob_g + 1.5*sin(7*mid)*4.35*time;
per_frame_11=dy = -0.008 * sin(0.5*time);
per_frame_12=dx = -0.008*  cos(0.26*time);
per_pixel_1=rot = rot + if (below(rad,0.4+ 0.2*sin(bass/mid)), abs(0.06*abs(bass/treb)*sin(time)+ 0.01*abs(mid/treb/bass))*cos(time), 0);
per_pixel_2=it = 0.3*sin(time*0.2);
per_pixel_3=radm = rad*0.5;
per_pixel_4=rot = 0.02*sin((radm+it)*30)/((rad+0.1)*((sin(time)*0.4+0.5)*20));
per_pixel_5=mod = sin(ang*5);
per_pixel_6=mod = mod*mod;
per_pixel_7=zoom = .99 - abs(0.01*mod);
per_pixel_8=mx = (x-.5)*1.33;
per_pixel_9=my = y - .5;
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=sw = above(rad,.4) + below(rad,.04) + above(rad,.3)*below(rad,.4)*(rad-.3)*5;
per_pixel_12=sw = above(rad,.3)*(rad-.3)*5;
per_pixel_13=
per_pixel_14=zoom = 1 - .1*sw;
per_pixel_15=
per_pixel_16=rot = 0 + .2*sw;
per_pixel_17=
per_pixel_18=dx = (1-sw)*sin(ang)*.001*.75;
per_pixel_19=dy = (1-sw)*cos(ang)*.001;
per_pixel_20=rot=rot*atan2(-rad,sin(ang*20-ang*20*ang*10*atan2(above(bass,bass_Att),above(Treb,t
per_pixel_21=reb_Att))))*sin(Rad*ang*above(Bass,bass_Att))*rad-ang;
